contentrichtext.text: The title '''Summa Theologiae''' (or, in some cases, '''Summa Theologica''') refers to several different theological works: #[[Summa Theologica (Antoninus of Florence)|Summa Theologica]] by [[Antoninus of Florence]] #''[[Summa Theologica]]'' by [[Thomas Aquinas]] #[[Summa Theologiae (Albertus Magnus)|Summa Theologiae]] by [[Albertus Magnus]] #[[Summa Theologiae (John Wycliffe)|Summa Theologiae]] by [[John Wycliffe]] ==See also== *[[Summa]] {{disambig}} [[Category:Medieval literature]] [[Category:Scholasticism]]
